title: go2rtc LXC
textContent:
go2rtc LXC 
                go2rtc is
                    the
                    ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, WebRTC, HomeKit, FFmpeg, RTMP, etc.
                To create a new Proxmox VE go2rtc LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell. 
                    To Update go2rtc, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.
                Copybash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/go2rtc.sh)"
                ⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡
                go2rtc Interface - IP:1984
outerHTML:
go2rtc LXC

go2rtc is the ultimate camera streaming application with support RTSP, WebRTC, HomeKit, FFmpeg, RTMP, etc.

To create a new Proxmox VE go2rtc LXC, run the following in the Proxmox VE Shell.
To Update go2rtc, run the command below (or type update) in the LXC Console.

bash -c "$(wget -qLO - https://github.com/community-scripts/ProxmoxVE/raw/main/ct/go2rtc.sh)"

⚡ Default Settings: 2GB RAM - 4GB Storage - 2vCPU ⚡

go2rtc Interface - IP:1984
